name: Witch Simulator 2000+
description:
A witch simulator where customers come to your house to ask for potions and you have to cook them. The potions.

Warning: unfinished, still needs more content, but playable.

Prepare a cauldron and put it on the fire using prepare. You can now start adding the ingredients to the cauldron (down arrow below ingredients) and adjust the temperature (up and down below the cauldron). When your mix is ready, cool it down and put it in a glass by clicking done.

The customers will knock on your door, you have to answer their knocks and let them in. Then they will tell you what potion they want and you can decide to accept (they will come back for the completed potion later), decline (they will walk away) or give them a potion you made earlier (drag to their slot and select give).

When you accepted the order and customers are back, drag the completed potion to the slot near them and choose give.

They will walk away and give you feedback. Your goal is to get as good feedbacks as possible and be in the Top 10 of the wiches in the country.

Check the Codex in game for more info, i.e. ingredient and substance description.

Using the free font Compassion by Eeve Somepx. Thanks!
